_description: A bunch of FFXIV-related stuff I try making.

bozja.title: Bozja-Südfront
bozja.description: Interactive map for the Bozjan Southern Front.

chocoboColor.title: Chocobo Farbe
chocoboColor.description: Calculator for changing your chocobo’s color.

highOrLow.title: Höher oder Tiefer
highOrLow.description: Calculator for the guessing game “High or Low” played against Tista-Bie in Eulmore.

miniCactpot.title: Mini-Glückskaktor
miniCactpot.description: Calculator for the Mini Cactpot lottery.

nameGenerator.title: Name Generator
nameGenerator.description: FFXIV random name generator for all the races.

oceanFishing.title: Auf großer Fahrt
oceanFishing.description: Schedule for upcoming ocean fishing voyages with information on blue fish, achievements, and more.

skywatcher.title: Meteorologin
skywatcher.description: Schedule for weather in Eorzea and forecaster for upcoming weather patterns.

wondrousTails.title: Khloes Abenteueralbum
wondrousTails.description: Calculator for the Wondrous Tails mini-game.

xivapi.title: XIVAPI
xivapi.description: An interface for browsing the XIVAPI.
